title: Go-to-Market Rebrand Strategy
description: For Everclear's rebrand from Connext, I led the repositioning from a B2C to B2B focus, coupled with a token migration introducing new utility. Our approach ensured a sequential rollout: communicating changes in order, their impact on users and the project, and the sunsetting of the old offering. When the initial tagline fell short, I revisited it from first principles—emphasizing our shift from competing with projects to supporting them—and proposed "The Backbone of Bridging," a self-explanatory alternative to vague phrases like "the first clearing layer."
challenge: Redefine brand positioning in a competitive Web3 landscape while maintaining core values and community trust during transition.
solution: Developed a multi-phase rebranding strategy with market research, competitive analysis, and community-driven messaging framework.
results: Successfully repositioned brand with 40% increase in market awareness, 60% growth in community engagement, and improved brand perception scores.

testimonial.text: Laurence's rebranding strategy transformed our market position. His strategic approach helped us stand out while staying true to our community values.
testimonial.author: Alex Chen, Founder

title: Native Web3 Paid Advertising
categories: Paid Media, Web3 Advertising, Performance Marketing
description: To promote Everclear's new token staking feature, we targeted a native Web3 audience familiar with similar protocols, clearly communicating the project's value, token mechanics, and incentives through a partnership with ad company Slise. I leveraged Dune Analytics to identify and segment users of comparable staking protocols. Collaborating with a graphic designer, I developed concept drafts for visuals and conducted A/B testing within the live ad campaign—including variants featuring an ad for a crosschain analytics dashboard that I helped design—achieving a 0.45% CTR that resulted in a 3.8% increase in protocol staking.
challenge: Navigate Web3 advertising restrictions while reaching crypto-native audiences through authentic, non-intrusive ad experiences.
solution: Created native advertising campaigns across Web3 media, DeFi platforms, and crypto communities with performance tracking.
results: Achieved 3.2x ROAS across Web3 channels, 45% lower CPA than traditional advertising, and 25% higher engagement rates.

testimonial.text: The Web3 advertising approach was game-changing. Laurence understood how to reach crypto audiences authentically without feeling like traditional ads.
testimonial.author: Maya Williams, CMO

title: Content Marketing & Socials
categories: Content Strategy, Social Media, Community Engagement
description: Previously, content creation felt reactive, often resulting in filler posts due to a lack of structured ideas. To address this, I established a comprehensive content calendar, ensuring a consistent flow of high-quality topics across categories like educational content, thought leadership, partnerships, and community engagement. I also revamped post formatting for greater appeal—making them concise, readable, and engaging—while providing concept graphics to guide the designer and emphasizing high-quality, appropriate replies to user interactions. By directing this content marketing campaign, I elevated key engagement KPIs by 204% within three months.
challenge: Transform reactive content creation into strategic, engagement-driven campaigns that resonate with Web3 audiences.
solution: Developed comprehensive content calendar with structured topics, improved formatting, and strategic community engagement.
results: Elevated key engagement KPIs by 204% within three months through strategic content planning and community interaction.

testimonial.text: The content strategy transformation was remarkable. Laurence turned our sporadic posting into a cohesive, engaging narrative that our community loves.
testimonial.author: Sarah Kim, Community Manager

title: Community Engagement
description: Building authentic relationships in Web3 communities requires more than just posting announcements. I developed a comprehensive community engagement strategy that focuses on genuine value creation, educational content, and meaningful conversations. Through strategic partnerships with key community members and consistent, valuable contributions across Discord, Twitter, and Telegram, we built a loyal, engaged community that actively promotes and supports the project.
challenge: Build authentic community engagement in a space filled with promotional noise and skeptical audiences.
solution: Created value-first engagement strategy with educational content, genuine conversations, and strategic community partnerships.
results: Increased community engagement by 300%, reduced churn by 40%, and built a network of 500+ active community advocates.

testimonial.text: Laurence's community approach transformed our relationship with users. We went from broadcasting to real conversations and meaningful connections.
testimonial.author: David Park, Community Lead

title: Growth Hacking
categories: Growth Strategy, User Acquisition, Performance Marketing
description: In the competitive Web3 landscape, traditional growth tactics often fall short. I implemented a data-driven growth hacking strategy that leveraged viral mechanics, referral programs, and community-driven acquisition channels. By analyzing user behavior patterns and optimizing conversion funnels, we identified and scaled the most effective growth levers while maintaining sustainable unit economics.
challenge: Achieve rapid, sustainable growth in a competitive Web3 market while maintaining healthy unit economics and authentic community.
solution: Implemented data-driven growth hacking with viral mechanics, referral programs, and optimized conversion funnels.
results: Achieved 400% user growth in 6 months, 65% improvement in viral coefficient, and 50% reduction in customer acquisition cost.

testimonial.text: The growth results speak for themselves. Laurence found scalable channels we never knew existed and turned our users into our best marketers.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen, Head of Growth
